data.question: What is the empirical formula of PCN-136?
data.answer: C84H36O32Zr6

data.question: What method was used for the synthesis of PCN-136?
data.answer: Aromatization-driven postsynthetic annulation

data.question: What is the crystal system of PCN-136?
data.answer: Cubic

data.question: What is the space group of PCN-136?
data.answer: Fd-3m

data.question: What is the volume (V) of the unit cell for PCN-136?
Is the photocatalytic activity of PCN-136 higher than that of pbz-MOF-1?
data.answer: Yes

data.question: Does PCN-136 exhibit a photocatalytic activity of three times that of pbz-MOF-1?
data.answer: Yes

data.question: Was the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment conducted under visible-light irradiation?
data.answer: Yes

data.question: Was H2 detected as a product in the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment using PCN-136?
data.answer: No

data.question: Was the structure of PCN-136 maintained after reaction cycling?
data.answer: Yes

data.question: What is the role of TIPA in the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment?
data.answer: Serves as an electron donor and hydrogen donor

data.question: How was the photocatalytic performance of PCN-136 compared to pbz-MOF-1?
data.answer: PCN-136 showed nearly 3 times higher HCOO– yield than pbz-MOF-1 under the same reaction conditions

data.question: What was the effect of introducing Ru(bpy)3Cl2 into the pbz-MOF-1 system?
data.answer: The amount of HCOO– anion produced from pbz-MOF-1 increased to a level comparable to that of PCN-136

data.question: What was the purpose of using a UV-cutoff filter in the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment?
data.answer: To ensure that only visible light was used for irradiation

data.question: What was the result of the Mott-Schottky measurement for PCN-136?
data.answer: The positive slope of the obtained C2– values is consistent with those of typical n-type semiconductors

data.question: Was the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment with PCN-136 selective towards a specific product?
data.answer: Yes, the catalyst is highly selective toward the conversion to HCOO–

data.question: Did the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment with PCN-136 produce any gaseous products?
data.answer: No, there was no H2, CH4, or CO observed

data.question: Was the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment with PCN-136 conducted in a mixed solvent system?
data.answer: Yes, it was conducted in a mixed MeCN/H2O system

data.question: What was the role of the xenon arc lamp in the photocatalytic CO2 reduction experiment?
data.answer: It was used as the irradiation source

data.question: What was the effect of the π-conjugated hexabenzocoronene-based linkers in PCN-136?
data.answer: They improved the optical absorption of the materials and largely increased the yield of the photocatalytic reaction
